title: Understanding the SUM Function
text: The 'SUM' function is primarily used to perform a basic arithmetic operation on a set of numbers.

title: Identifying the Operation
text: The operation performed by the 'SUM' function involves combining values to reach a total.

title: Focus on Addition
text: The 'SUM' function is not used for finding averages, counting, or identifying minimum values.

title: Range of Numbers
text: The 'SUM' function works on a range of numbers, adding them together to produce a single result.

hintAnswer: To add up a range of numbers
title: Final Step
choices: To add up a range of numbers
To find the average of a range of numbers
To count the number of cells in a range
To find the minimum value in a range
